job.title: Principal Software Engineer
job.description: brstrongThis is where you save and sustain lives brbrstrongAt Baxter we are deeply connected by our mission No matter your role at Baxter your work makes a positive impact on people around the world Youll feel a sense of purpose throughout the organization as we know our work improves outcomes for millions of patients brbrBaxters products and therapies are found in almost every hospital worldwide in clinics and in the home For over 85 years we have pioneered significant medical innovations that transform healthcarebrbrTogether we create a place where we are happy successful and inspire each other This is where you can do your best work brbrJoin us at the intersection of saving and sustaining lives where your purpose accelerates our mission brbrSoftware is recognized as a programming expert and platform SME who leads complex software platform by identifying solving programming and design issues during development implementation and sustaining product phases Understands the software development life cycle and agile methodologies and takes ownership of software platform deliverables including software design code and test Collaborates with cross functional team of stakeholders system clinical Human Factors UIUX to drive decisions This leader will be key contributor in aiding to the Baxter culture levers of Speed Collaboration Courage and SimplicitybrbrApplies a solid understanding of standard engineering techniques procedures and criteria as part of the software development lifecycle SDLC toward the development of new or enhanced software products or processes Plans executes and functionally directs important engineering assignments which require independent judgmentbr brbrstrongEssential Role and Responsibilities brstrongulliPerform standard software development assignments software requirements specification design develop code unit testing etc which are typically a significant portion of a larger project adhering to defined methods techniques theories corporate and division Standard Operating PoliciesliliProvide technical input and scheduling information to cross functional teamsliliSelect sound techniques to solve problems and make design recommendations under direction of supervisorliliIndependently plans schedules and leads embedded platform team in detailed phases of software design and developmentliliMake recommendations for software product and process improvements based on technical knowledgeliliResponsible for the design documentation implementation and support for embedded software including RTOS Use Interface IO and controls test equipment emulatorssimulators software and network device and communication softwareliliRecognized as a technical expert in embedded softwarehardware interface designs features and external interfacesbrbrliulstrongQualificationsbrstrongulliBS in Computer Science Computer Engineering Electrical Engineering Software Engineering or related field and minimum of 5 years of experience preferred 8 10 years of related experienceliliA solid technical understanding of the principles and procedures of software engineering eg SDLC IEC 62304 AgileliliExperience with Linux including C GUI development Object Oriented Analysis MVC design pattern Multithreaded OS Gerrit and GIT  liliExperience with QTQML and RTOS is preferableliliExperience with medical device software engineering disciplines eg software development environments configuration management tools code inspection techniques and tools testing methods and test management toolsliliAbility to discuss normally encountered technical or project management issues both verbally and in written formliliExtensive crossfunctional team experience including technical and nontechnical workbrbrbrbrliulstrongEqual Employment OpportunitybrbrstrongBaxter is an equal opportunity employer Baxter evaluates qualified applicants without regard to race color religion gender national origin age sexual orientation gender identity or expression protected veteran status disabilityhandicap status or any other legally protected characteristicbr
